author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for examples of how jurisdictions evaluate their lobbyist contracts. They have a contract expiring in the near future and would like to know how others evaluate the performance of lobbyist under their contracts.
Your timely response is appreciated!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Evaluating Lobbyist Contracts
